entry.title: King Canada MA-511 - Wood Mortising Attachment Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type: Accessories
Price: 132.56

[shortdesc]

Wood mortising attachment

  • Wood mortising attachment with 4 piece mortising chisels and bits (1/4”, 3/8”, 1/2” and 5/8”)
  • Converts your drill press into a mortising machine for all your square hole drilling needs
  • Fits King Canada drill presses models KC-116C(FC), KC-117C(FC), KC-116N(FN), KC-117N(FN), KC-118FC, KC-118FC-LS and most other brands of drill presses available on the market with quill diameters of 55mm, 60mm or 65mm
  • Kit comes with chisel holder, holddown arms, holddown bracket, fence, ring bushing adaptors, 4 piece 1/2” shank mortising chisels and bits and carrying case
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand King Canada
    Product Type Accessories

entry.title: King Canada MA-1050ST - Hollow Chisel Mortiser With Tilting Head 5/8 Inch
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type: Mortisers (Hollow Chisel) & Accessories
Price: 809.61

[shortdesc]

5/8 Inch Hollow chisel mortiser with tilting head

  • Powerful 3/4 HP enclosed fan cooled ribbed body motor for long life and trouble-free operation Longitudinal sliding table with locking system prevents unnecessary repositionning and reclamping of the workpiece Gas head cylinder for smooth and controled cuts Rack and pinion gears move entire head for maximum leverage and positive feed control Heavy-duty precision machined cast-iron construction Includes sleeve adaptors which accept 5/8” and 3/4” diameter chisel shanks Adjustable depth and height stops Comes complete with mortising chisel and bit set (1/4”, 5/16”, 3/8” and 1/2”), 1/2” chuck and key, column mounted hold down, pair of 9 positions table hold downs and quick release vise
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand King Canada
    Product Type Mortisers (Hollow Chisel) & Accessories
